developerPortfolio.expertise: Extensive experience in web development, digital marketing, and business consultancy.
developerPortfolio.background: Over 10 years of experience in helping businesses grow their online presence and improve their operational efficiency.
developerPortfolio.approach: A client-centric approach focused on delivering tailored solutions to meet specific business needs.

about.title: About Me

myStory.paragraph1: I'm a software engineer and digital consultant with extensive experience in web development, blockchain technology, and business optimization.
myStory.paragraph2: My approach combines technical expertise with strategic thinking to deliver solutions that drive real business value.
myStory.paragraph3: I believe in continuous learning and staying ahead of technological trends to provide cutting-edge solutions for my clients.
myStory.paragraph4: Beyond coding, I'm passionate about helping businesses and individuals navigate the digital landscape and achieve their goals.

about.examplesDescription: Here are some highlights of my work:
examples: Built scalable web applications using Next.js and modern tech stack
Developed and implemented Web3 solutions for various businesses
Provided strategic consulting for digital transformation projects

contactForm.title: Contact Form Cookies
contactForm.description: Our website uses Google reCAPTCHA on the contact form, which may set cookies to:
purposes: Verify that you are a human user
Ensure the security of form submissions

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Cookies
thirdParty.description: Google reCAPTCHA is provided by Google Inc. The use of reCAPTCHA is subject to the Google Privacy Policy and Terms of Service.

control.title: Cookie Control
control.description: You can control and/or delete cookies as you wish through your browser settings. However, this may affect the functionality of the contact form.

dataCollection.title: Contact Form Data Collection
dataCollection.description: When you use our contact form, we collect:

dataUsage.title: Data Usage
dataUsage.description: The information you provide through the contact form is used solely to:

dataProtection.title: Data Protection
dataProtection.description: Your data is securely processed and stored. We do not share your personal information with third parties except as necessary to operate the contact form (e.g., reCAPTCHA verification).

formUsage.title: Contact Form Usage
formUsage.description: By using our contact form, you agree to:
conditions: Not use the form for spam or malicious purposes
Accept our privacy policy and cookie policy
Comply with reCAPTCHA terms of service

responseTime.title: Response Time
responseTime.description: While we strive to respond to all inquiries promptly, we cannot guarantee specific response times. By submitting the form, you acknowledge that response times may vary.

content.title: Content Guidelines
content.description: Messages sent through the contact form should not contain inappropriate, offensive, or illegal content. We reserve the right to ignore or report any communications that violate these guidelines.

contactFeedback.subject: [no reply]: Thanks for contacting us
contactFeedback.message: We have received your request. We will get in touch as soon as possible.
